widget.header: Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

config.title: First PPC Monthly Report Sent
description: After several months of development, we automated and delivered the first report for our PPC clients. This report will be sent to PPC clients in the same way we send reports for Web and Blog clients each month. Thank you to everybody who was involved in making it happen!

config.title: Avanza’s First 25 Blog Posts
description: Since its launch on April 23rd of this year, our Spanish blog Avanza now has its first 25 blog posts published. We will continue including the most popular and recent posts from Onward for all of the Spanish-speaking community.

config.title: Automated QA for the Lawyer Directory
description: We now have a tool that automatically scans our directory to detect and report errors and data inconsistencies. This is crucial to offer a reliable and safe product for our clients and free up time for our team.
